name: Lost Hunter
description:
This game was developed for a 48 hour game jam, but I couldn't finish it so I worked for another 48 hours to be able to finish it.

In the game you are a pilot what is lost in space and you need to survive for 3 minutes.

Controls:

Movement – A, W,S,D;

Left mouse button – Shoot;

Rotate with mouse
